<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Remove cascade delete on utt ref of UFT</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
dictGr.addQuery('name', 'ml_label_user_feedback');
dictGr.addQuery('element', 'utterance_reference');
dictGr.addNotNullQuery('reference_cascade_rule');
dictGr.setLimit(1);
dictGr.query();

if (dictGr.next()) {
    dictGr.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', '');
    dictGr.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-07 09:40:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d16c3a0fc75a1110c59d3d9c95c2602a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove cascade delete on utt ref of UFT</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d16c3a0fc75a1110c59d3d9c95c2602a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-07 09:48:05</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
